name: Professional DSLR Camera
description: High-resolution DSLR camera with advanced autofocus system and 4K video capabilities.
fullDescription: This professional-grade DSLR camera features a 24.2MP full-frame sensor, advanced 45-point autofocus system, and 4K video recording at 30fps. With built-in Wi-Fi and NFC connectivity, you can easily share your photos and videos. The durable magnesium alloy body is weather-sealed for shooting in tough conditions.

name: 4K Video Camera
description: Professional 4K video camera with large sensor and cinematic color profiles.
fullDescription: This 4K video camera features a Super 35mm sensor, professional cinematic color profiles, and built-in ND filters. It supports 4K recording at up to 60fps and Full HD at up to 120fps for slow motion. The camera includes dual XLR inputs with phantom power for professional audio recording.
features: Dual XLR inputs with phantom power
Full HD at 120fps for slow motion

name: Studio Lighting Kit
description: Complete 3-light studio kit with softboxes, stands, and carrying case.
fullDescription: This complete 3-light studio kit includes three 85W daylight-balanced LED lights with adjustable color temperature (3200K-5600K). Each light comes with a 24"x24" softbox, light stand, and the kit includes a convenient carrying case. Perfect for portrait, product, and video lighting.

name: Wireless Microphone System
description: Professional wireless lavalier microphone system for video production.
fullDescription: This professional wireless lavalier microphone system provides crystal clear audio for video production. The system includes a transmitter with clip-on microphone and a compact receiver. It features 128-bit encrypted transmission, 100m operating range, and automatic frequency selection to avoid interference.

name: Video Editing Laptop
description: High-performance laptop optimized for video editing and color grading.
fullDescription: This high-performance laptop is specifically optimized for video editing and color grading. It features a 10-core processor, 32GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and a dedicated 8GB GPU. The 16" 4K OLED display covers 100% of DCI-P3 color space and is calibrated at the factory for accurate color reproduction.

name: Camera Backpack
description: Professional camera backpack with customizable compartments and weather resistance.
fullDescription: This professional camera backpack features customizable compartments to fit your gear perfectly. The weather-resistant construction keeps your equipment safe in all conditions. It includes a built-in laptop compartment, tripod holder, and comfortable padded straps for all-day carrying comfort.

name: Prime Portrait Lens
description: 85mm prime lens with wide aperture for beautiful portrait photography.
fullDescription: This 85mm prime lens features a wide f/1.4 aperture for beautiful background blur and excellent low-light performance. The advanced optical design minimizes aberrations while delivering sharp, high-contrast images. The fast and quiet autofocus makes it ideal for both photography and video work.

name: Gimbal Stabilizer
description: 3-axis motorized gimbal stabilizer for smooth handheld video.
fullDescription: This 3-axis motorized gimbal stabilizer provides buttery smooth footage for handheld video. It features multiple stabilization modes, object tracking, and a built-in OLED display. The ergonomic design includes a joystick for precise control and a quick-release plate for fast camera mounting.

name: LED Panel Light
description: Bi-color LED panel with adjustable brightness and color temperature.
fullDescription: This bi-color LED panel features adjustable brightness and color temperature (3200K-5600K). The high CRI (>95) ensures accurate color reproduction for photography and video. It includes a built-in battery plate for portable use, barn doors for light control, and can be powered by AC or NP-F batteries.

name: Audio Interface
description: Compact USB audio interface with high-quality preamps and studio monitoring.
fullDescription: This compact USB audio interface features high-quality mic preamps, 24-bit/192kHz converters, and studio monitoring capabilities. It includes two combo XLR/TRS inputs with phantom power, MIDI I/O, and direct monitoring for zero-latency recording. Perfect for podcasting, voice-over, and music production.
